what_you_do: Manny Nowak is an Executive Business Consultant, author, and professional speaker.
who_you_serve: Manny helps business owners and organizations across the country.
social_proof: Manny has helped dozens of companies move from simply doing well to achieving extraordinary growth, driving businesses to expand by 100-700%.
signature_programs: Manny is currently leading the innovative "Covert Leadership" training program.
business_focus: Manny's core expertise centers on three pillars of success: Sales, Finance, and Leadership.
